about_description: A beautiful Ultra 2048 puzzle game built with Flutter. Slide numbered tiles to combine them and reach the 2048 tile!
help_description: Learn how to play Ultra 2048 and master the puzzle game.
feedback_description: We'd love to hear your thoughts about the game and suggestions for improvements!
made_with_love: Made with ‚ù§Ô∏è from Hyderabad, Telangana, India
built_with_flutter: Built with Flutter and AI assistance
game_instructions: Swipe to move tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one!
reset_data_confirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all game data? This action cannot be undone.
blocker_tiles_info: Blocker tiles appear when you merge 256+ tiles. They can only merge with other blocker tiles.
blocker_merge_info: When two blocker tiles merge, they disappear from the board.
new_game_confirmation_message: You have a game in progress. Starting a new game will lose your current progress. Are you sure?
select_game_mode_description: Pick the perfect game mode for your skill level and time
regular_game_description: Classic 2048 gameplay with no time pressure. Perfect for strategic thinking.
time_attack_description: Race against the clock! Complete objectives before time runs out.
scenic_mode_description: Relax and enjoy beautiful backgrounds while playing classic 2048.
user_profile_description: Manage your game profile and statistics

continue_for_higher_score: Keep playing to reach even higher scores!

help_basic_gameplay_desc: Swipe in any direction (up, down, left, right) to move all tiles
help_keyboard_controls_desc: Use WASD keys or arrow keys (works with touch controls)
help_tile_movement_desc: Tiles slide smoothly with animations, new tiles appear instantly
help_merging_rules_desc: Combine identical numbered tiles to create higher values
help_win_condition_desc: Reach the 2048 tile (you can continue playing for higher scores)
help_game_over_desc: When no valid moves remain on the board
help_blocker_rule_1: Only merge with other blocker tiles
help_blocker_rule_2: When two blockers merge, they disappear completely
help_blocker_rule_3: Cannot be moved or merged with numbered tiles
help_powerup_unlock_desc: First powerup at 1,000 points, then every 2,000 points (3,000, 5,000, 7,000, etc.)
help_tile_destroyer_desc: Select and remove any tile from the board
help_row_clear_desc: Clear an entire row of tiles
help_column_clear_desc: Clear an entire column of tiles
help_value_upgrade_desc: Upgrade all tiles to their next value
help_tile_freeze_desc: Temporarily freeze tiles with visual indicators
help_powerup_usage_desc: Interactive selection mode with visual feedback
help_time_attack_mode_desc: Countdown timer with MM:SS format and color progression
help_scenic_mode_desc: Random background images with transparent UI elements
help_keyboard_support_desc: WASD and arrow keys work simultaneously with touch
help_pause_controls_desc: Accessible via pause button with menu overlay options
help_score_display_desc: Full numbers up to 10,000, then 'k' abbreviation for larger values
help_statistics_desc: Comprehensive game statistics available in leaderboard section
help_corner_strategy_desc: Keep your highest tile in a corner and build around it
help_direction_consistency_desc: Try to move in only 3 directions, avoiding the 4th when possible
help_powerup_timing_desc: Save powerups for difficult situations or to clear space
help_blocker_management_desc: Use blockers strategically - they can help or hinder your progress
help_faq_how_to_play: How do I play the game?
help_faq_how_to_play_answer: Swipe tiles in any direction to move them. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one! Try to reach the 2048 tile.
help_faq_win_condition: How do I win the game?
help_faq_win_condition_answer: Create a tile with the number 2048 to win! You can continue playing to reach even higher numbers.
help_faq_powerups_answer: Powerups unlock at 1,000 points and then every 2,000 points. Tap a powerup to activate it and follow the on-screen instructions.
help_faq_blockers_answer: Blocker tiles appear after merging 256+ tiles. They only merge with other blockers and disappear when two merge together.
help_faq_game_modes: What are the different game modes?
help_faq_game_modes_answer: Choose from Classic (standard gameplay), Time Attack (with timer), or Scenic (with backgrounds).
help_faq_controls_answer: You can use touch gestures (swipe) or keyboard controls (WASD or arrow keys). Both work simultaneously.
help_contact_support: If you couldn't find what you're looking for, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
